___message.description: The human-readable message describing the restriction.

___restriction_id.description: The ARC UUID of the distributor of this content. E.g., ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ.

$eref.description: A globally unique identifier of the content in the ANS repository.
$eref.title: Globally Unique ID trait

$eref.description: This represents a reference to external content that should be denormalized
$eref.title: Representation of a normalized element

___referent_properties.description: An object for key-value pairs that should override the values of keys with the same name in the denormalized object

___website.description: The website which the referenced id belongs to. Currently supported only for sections.

___type.description: The ANS type that the provider should return.

___provider.description: A URL that can resolve the id into an ANS element

___id.description: The id passed to the provider to retrieve an ANS document

___service.description: The type of interaction the provider expects. E.g., 'oembed'
